hover_colors(color_hover, color_out=None)¶

Change the color of the button background when the mouse is hover

Usage:

rptObj.ui.icons.capture().icon.hover_colors("red", "yellow")
Parameters

  • color_hover – String. The color of the icon when mouse hover

  • color_out – Optional, String. The color of the icon when mouse out
